Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 5th overall pick, by New York (A) in 1971...
Injured on 8/10/1972 with a Torn Thigh Muscle, out for 4-5 weeks...
Injured on 7/17/1973 with a Sprained Ankle, out for 5 days...
Injured on 8/30/1976 with a Pulled Anterior Cruciate Ligament, out for 3-4 weeks...
Traded from New York (A) to Chicago (N) on 1/31/1981 (Going to CHC: 1B K. Hernandez. Going to NYY: SS C. Lemon)...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/1/1981, off Dan Spillner (LA)...
Injured on 5/11/1981 with a Torn Thigh Muscle, out for full season...
Hit first career homerun on 4/13/1982, off Buzz Capra (HOU)...
Released by Chicago (N) on 8/22/1983...
Signed as a free agent by New York (N) on 10/30/1983 to a minor league deal...
